body.name: Solar Lights Outdoor, Solar Torch Light with Flickering Flame for Garden Decor, Solar Garden Lights, Waterproof Solar Powered Outdoor Lights, Flame Torches for Outside Patio Pathway Yard Decorations

Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 6 mins
features: FLICKERING FLAMES TORCH LIGHTS: IkeeRuic small solar outdoor lights cast a lovely warm glow like flickering flame, a safe alternative to the real “flames”. Solar torch lights are perfect outdoor decorations for patio, garden, porch, yard, pathway, making your yard stand out in the community.

SOLAR POWERED & OUTDOOR DECOR: Equipped with high-efficiency solar panel, solar torches can work up 6-8 hours in summer and 4-6 hours in winter after fully charged. Solar powered outdoor lights provide vivid and dancing outdoor decor for outside, party, camping, BBQ and holiday.

HASSLE FREE INSTALLATION: No wires and tools needed, small garden lights solar powered are easy to install. Just connect the parts and stake into the ground where there is direct sunshine. Please turn on the switch before first use, then outdoor solar lights can light up from dusk to dawn automatically.

WATERPROOF LUCES SOLARES: Solar lights outdoor waterproof are made of high-quality ABS plastics, designed to withstand most of weather for multi-season outside decor. No worries about rain, snow, frost and high-temperature. And notice that weather and winter will affect solar lights charging efficiency.

OUTSIDE LIGHTS PURCHASE SERVICE: IkeeRuic offers a ONE-YEAR New Replacement Policy for outdoor lighting products. Any problems for flame lights, please feel free to contact us via Amazon. Please charge outdoor lights under direct sunlight for 6-8hours before first use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good back light for patios or walkways
reviews.reviewText: cute, not bright yet will enhance are where used. Good price and helps save instead of using electrical options. Savings over time will pay for itself over time,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life like Flames
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd set I’ve purchased if these solar torches. I’ve give them as gifts as well. They charge easily in sun , sometime even when it’s cloudy and will light up all night. Beautil to look at in the dark. Attractive casing and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but only on for a couple hours
reviews.reviewText: These lights are really pretty and I’m happy with them, but they don’t last long each night. They turn on around 6pm right now and they’re off by 9pm. I live in FL and have them south facing, so there’s a good amount of sun. I had hoped they’d stay on a bit later into the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these a few months ago and put them out at my hunting shack in the country. They all glow with the same brightness and the flames look great at night. I will be buying another pack of these in the spring for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Flame look is pretty cool. They go for a while but do not make it through the whole night. Good value for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small Torches, Short Light Time
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: These are cheap because they're small and don't stay lit very long. I recommend you keep looking.Other LED torch lights I've bought (both the pricey TomCare brand and misc non-brand ones) are about twice the size of these and stay lit all night (even after two years) after receiving less than direct sunlight during the day. These, however, lose power after 3-4 hours even when they are positioned to receive full sunlight. I tried turning them off for a couple sunny days to let them charge fully, and even then only got 5-ish hours of light from them.I can overlook the fact that they're smaller than my other torch lights because the dimensions are given in the description, so that oversight is on me, but the fact that they don't stay lit for very long under optimum conditions is truly disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these! I plan to buy more.
reviews.reviewText: They are not "bright" but give a realistic glow. I have four of them at the corners of my "outdoor" living room that has a fire pit in the center. We had a small fire burning in the pit. It was dark out and I went in to get something. Looking outside through a window it looked like I had 5 fires burning. At a distance the torches could easily be mistake for additional fires. I love them. We have snow right now and at night out of the piles of snow I have nightly "fires burning".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They're OK I Guess-Update
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to turn on and put together. Sadly they aren't very bright and one of the six arrived defective and doesnt work at all. Perhaps more sunny days will help, but not holding out much hope.Update: After my review, the seller reached out to me and quickly sent a replacement for the defective lamp. They are definitely not going to light your way, but I love the spooky Halloween accent. Will be back to buy more. Pleased with responsive seller.
Solcellslamporna är mycket bra, dessutom suveränt kort leveranstid från er! 👏👏👏

Ich muss sagen, dass wir wirklich positiv überrascht wurden.Zunächst waren wir sehr skeptisch, weil sich das Ganze doch ein wenig spillerig anfühlt und beim in die Hand nehmen nicht so wirkt als wäre es hochwertig verarbeitet. Auch hier sollte man das Ganze in Relation zum Preis sehen.Bis jetzt funktionieren alle Fackeln aus dem Paket absolut zuverlässig und haben bis jetzt jedem Wetter getrotzt. Sie gehen zuverlässig jeden Abend an wenn die Sonne weg ist, und halten fast die gesamte Nacht durch, wir waren wirklich erstaunt wie lange sie wirklich noch brennen. Das Licht ist wirklich sehr angenehm und lässt sich schön von drinnen und draußen betrachten, mit der entsprechenden zierblende in die richtige Richtung gedreht, macht es wirklich Spaß und Fackeln zuzugucken.Eine wirklich gelungene und schöne Ergänzung für den Balkon.Die Lichtausbeute bei uns ist natürlich auch hervorragend, ich kann mir vorstellen, dass die Fackel nicht ganz so viel Spaß machen, wenn man nicht genug Sonnenlicht über den Tag sammeln kann.
Fackeln sind super,flackern als wären sie echt.

reviews.reviewTitle: Toller Effekt am Tag aber Hässlich
reviews.reviewText: Die LED-Solarfackeln sind bei Nacht absolut überzeugend und schaffen eine faszinierende Atmosphäre. Ihr warmes Licht sorgt für eine angenehme Stimmung und schafft ein schönes Ambiente. Allerdings muss ich erwähnen, dass das Erscheinungsbild der Fackeln am Tag etwas enttäuschend ist. Das Gehäuse wirkt potthässlich und sehr kitschig, was den Gesamteindruck mindert.Was die Solarleistung betrifft, funktionieren die Fackeln im Sommer sehr gut. Sie laden sich zuverlässig auf und leuchten die ganze Nacht über. Allerdings bleibt abzuwarten, wie sie sich im Winter verhalten werden, da die Sonneneinstrahlung möglicherweise reduziert ist.Trotz des gemischten Designs und des potenziellen Winterproblems, muss man den Effekt bei Nacht und den günstigen Preis der LED-Solarfackeln loben. Sie schaffen eine eindrucksvolle Beleuchtung und sind eine kostengünstige Option, um eine stimmungsvolle Atmosphäre zu schaffen.
